scripts.deploy: node ensureDomain.js && npm run build && npm run build --prefix ../frontend && npm run build --prefix ../backend && cdk deploy \* --context env=prod --context parent_domain=$PARENT_DOMAIN
scripts.diff: npm run build && npm run build --prefix ../frontend && npm run build --prefix ../backend && cdk diff \* --context env=prod
scripts.synth: npm run build && npm run build --prefix ../frontend && npm run build --prefix ../backend && cdk synth \* --context env=prod
